messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM RUTH DAVIDSON
messages.content: This leaflet provides details about Ruth Davidson's Scottish Conservatives and their stance on various issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose SNP's push for another independence referendum which risks dragging Scotland back to the division of another independence referendum.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Oppose the SNP's plans for another independence referendum
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make devolution work and not pursue the constant constitutional wrangling and 'agenda of grievance' of the SNP.
Ensure this critical service gets the resources it needs, especially in mental health education and focus resources on prevention to relieve pressure on hospitals.
Back local enterprise to keep the economy growing and increase employment opportunities and living standards.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour and the Lib Dems can't win here.

issues.economy: Oppose SNP's push for another independence referendum to avoid economic uncertainty.
issues.governance: Oppose the SNP's push for another independence referendum and make devolution work for Scotland.
issues.health: Protect the NHS budget to ensure critical services get the required resources.

politicalExperience.achievements: Sandy Batho is mentioned as a former Councillor for Almond ward in Edinburgh, implying previous political experience.

endorsements.endorsement: An excellent candidate with focus on local decision making and policing.

I was a Liberal Democrat Councillor for Almond ward in Edinburgh. Now backing Sandy Batho & the Scottish Conservatives & the Scottish Conservatives. Don’t allow a second referendum to detract from the SNP’s poor domestic governance record.

quotes.text: Scots do not want a referendum
Jeremy Corbyn has seen that any referendum should be held after Brexit.
Nicola Sturgeon is demanding another independence referendum.

images.caption: A photo of Ruth Davidson and Nicola Sturgeon emphasizing the choice at the election.
A chart showing the poll percentage indicating tactical voting consideration.
A photo of the candidate Sandy Batho.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes opposition to SNP's independence referendum, the protection of NHS resources, support for jobs, and has various endorsements.
